feed.title: Invoice Ninja Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.11.65
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fixes for chunked uploads in react application.
  • v5.11.65 by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10872

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.11.64...v5.11.65

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.11.66
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fixes for docker logos in group/client scenarios
  • Fixes for last year query
  • v5.11.66 by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10877

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.11.65...v5.11.66

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.11.67
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Force locale for import hints
  • Additional middleware to check json quality
  • Additional translations
  • Prevent duplicate requisitions
  • Reduce number of queries to GoCardless/Nordigen to help prevent 429's
  • Fixes for EPC
  • Change order of indexes
  • Performance tracing with sentry
  • Updates for tax summary reports
  • Health route

  • Additional status values when processing csv imports

  • v5.11.67 by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10890

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.11.66...v5.11.67

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.11.68
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fixes for ValidJson middleware
  • v5.11.68 by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10894

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.11.67...v5.11.68

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.11.69
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Disable updateAccount() methods to preserve rate limits - Nordigen
  • Fixes for company observer checks
  • Updated domain blacklists
  • Fixes for braintree level 2 props
  • Fixes for statements when viewing a client with no invoics
  • Fixes for middle ware props causing a regression for document downloads
  • v5.11.69 by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10910

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.11.68...v5.11.69
